body.name: Betadine Clear First Aid Spray, Max Strength Pain Relieving Antiseptic Cleansing Spray, No Stinging, Kills 99.9% of Germs*, Helps Prevent Infections, 6 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 4 mins
features: HOSPITAL TRUSTED BRAND: Since 1955, Betadine has been the trusted brand in hospitals and for healthcare professionals.
MAX STRENGTH PAIN RELIEF: Maximum Strength Pain Relief with a powerful active ingredient (Pramoxine Hydrochloride). Powerful antiseptic cleansing spray (Benzalkonium Chloride)
KILLS 99% of GERMS: The Clear First Aid Spray kills 99% of germs to prevent infections. Protect yourself from skin infections of cuts, wounds, scrapes and burns.
NO STINGING, NO TEARS: Betadine Clear is effective without stinging, burning or tears.
EASY TO USE: First Aid Spray is easy to use. The application goes on clear - say goodbye to worrying about stains or mess.
body.description: The Betadine brand has been trusted by healthcare professionals to help prevent infections for over 50 years. Povidone-iodine remains a go-to antiseptic used both in hospitals and homes for the treatment of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns as may occur from minor household accidents or bicycle falls. It remains a go-to antiseptic used both in hospitals and homes for the treatment of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns as may occur from minor household accidents or bicycle falls. Betadine Clear First Aid Spray is convenient and is perfect for on-the go infection protection. Betadine works on a broad range of germs and microbes that can cause infections. Apply to minor cuts, scrapes, and burns to promptly kill germs and help stop infections before they start. Betadine Clear First Aid Spray comes with a “No-Sting Promise” and does not contain alcohol or hydrogen peroxide. Betadine is formulated with gentleness in mind and can be used on the whole family. Use as directed.
